Once again, Halloween falls across Tyria. The doorways between our world and the Mad Realm are opening, and the ancient Krytan monarch, Mad King Thorn, walks the streets of Lion's Arch again!

I've assured the Captain's Council that it's all relatively safe—this time—but I'm sure they'd appreciate a brave adventurer like yourself making an appearance. Not to mention the opportunities for field research in the Mad Realm itself! Visit me at the Grand Piazza at your earliest convenience!

—Magister Tassi
Speak with the Goddess of Truth and Knowledge.

A recollection of the life and deeds of Mad King Thorn, as told by his loyal subjects and friends. Contains a complete account of King Oswald Thorn's life, from boyhood to gruesome death.

—Mad King Thorn"
